page.title: 14 LOWER APPERLEY 2
page.content: A travelling library run by the Gloucestershire County Council also serves the area. We also saw a bakers van delivering bread and cakes. There are no schools in Lower Apperley and all the children go to Deerhurst Primary School in Apperley or to Tewkesbury to a Primary school or the Comprehensive school on the edge of the town 7 kilometres away. There is a park and a recreation field together with tennis courts. Cricket and Football are regular village activities. Most people rely on Tewkesbury for services such as the Police, Fire Service, Hospital, doctors, dentists, petrol and shops.
